name: 100 Bad Games
description:
DONT'T PLAY THIS!
Seriously it's super bad. A lot of games are broken and don't work in this built versions and lighting is completely of + Most games don't make fun! I Warned You!

I just upload this, since a lot of people requested it when I made those games in a live stream. 

What you should do on the other hand is watching this Great Video ;D
